layer.spellrigins.spell_affinity.name: Spell Affinity
origin.spellrigins.arcane.name: Arcane
origin.spellrigins.arcane.description: Jack of all spells, master of none
power.spellrigins.arcane_bonus.name: Arcane Bonus
power.spellrigins.mana_bonus.name: More Mana!
origin.spellrigins.fire_intermediate.des: As a lover of wilding flames, you gain superiority in fire spells but lack affinity in water-based spells
power.spellrigins.fire/ice_weakness.name: Ice Weakness
power.spellrigins.fire/ice_weakness.desc: You are weak to & with ice spells
power.spellrigins.fire/ice_fragility.des: You are very weak to & with ice spells
power.spellrigins.fire/aqua_weakness.des: You are weak to & with aqua spells
power.spellrigins.fire/aqua_fragility.de: You are very weak to & with aqua spells
power.spellrigins.fire/spellflame.descri: Your spells set enemies on fire for 10s
power.spellrigins.lon/lossofknowledge.de: As you engulf into your favourite schoool, you lose 10% power in all other schools
origin.spellrigins.fire_specialist.descr: A master of flames, all you care about is arson
origin.spellrigins.fire_novice.descripti: Fire is pretty cool, I guess
power.spellrigins.fire/firespellresist.d: All that training made you resistant to fire spells
origin.spellrigins.ice_intermediate.desc: Engage enemies with powerful freezing spells, but become weak with fire spells
power.spellrigins.fire_weakness.name: Fire Weakness
power.spellrigins.fire_weakness.descript: You are weak to & with fire spells
power.spellrigins.icespellresist.descrip: The ice cannot be frozen, and neither can you. Gain resistance to ice spells
power.spellrigins.fire_fragility.descrip: You are very weak to & with fire spells
origin.spellrigins.ice_specialist.descri: It has been long since you have seen anything other than the white and blue glory of the arctic
power.spellrigins.nature/naturesblight.d: Each spell you cast slightly blights your enemy, reducing their healing and damage
origin.spellrigins.nature_specialist.des: You are one with mother earth, you know are entangled within your own grasp and develop hatred for the flames that extenguish your habitat
power.spellrigins.holy/bowonlytogod.desc: You become resistant to and unable to use blood and eldritch spells. You are not weak nor fragile to any spell school
power.spellrigins.holy/smite.description: Deal +10% spell damage to undead enemies
